title: 2000년 Macklin 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Macklin. 판결일: 2000-03-30. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Errol Macklin, Also Known as Alvin Smith
**판결일**: 2000-03-30
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 270 A.D.2d 208
- 705 N.Y.S.2d 231

## 판결문 요약


—Judgment, Supreme Court, Bronx County (Dominic Massaro, J.), rendered March 13, 1997, convicting defendant, after a jury trial, of two counts of rape in the first degree, and sentencing him, as a second violent felony offender, to concurrent terms of 8 to 16 years, unanimously affirmed.
*209The verdict was not against the weight of the evidence. We see no reason to disturb the jury’s determinations concerning credibility. Concur — Tom, J. P., Ellerin, Wallach, Rubin and Saxe, JJ.
...
